mapper.select: select id, openid, name, phone, sex, id_number, avatar, create_time from user where openid = #{openid}
SELECT DATE(create_time) as date, COUNT(*) as newUserCount FROM user WHERE create_time >= #{begin} AND create_time <= #{end} GROUP BY DATE(create_time) ORDER BY date

SELECT DATE(create_time) AS date, COUNT(*) AS dailyNewUsers, SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (ORDER BY DATE(create_time)) AS cumulativeUsers FROM user WHERE create_time >= #{begin} AND create_time <= #{end} GROUP BY DATE(create_time) ORDER BY date
